programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is placed in isolation after disparaging other inmates. Alarms blare while a fight erupts in the shower room among inmates. A man booked into jail is revealed to have a 20-year arrest record.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV a man who insists he paid for a speeding ticket becomes so incensed that he is placed in a restraining chair. In Sarasota, FL a belligerent man accuses officers of touching him inappropriately. In Portland, OR officers help a young mother and her kids.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers outwit a man who refuses to give his name. A repeat DUI offender is jailed yet again. An intoxicated man is taken into custody and once the alcohol wears off he reveals that he’s broken his sobriety.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man in detention is paranoid about officers handling him inappropriately. A man in custody claims to have a seizure. A man is taken in to custody for stealing videogaming equipment.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An uncooperative woman fights arrest resulting in a trip to the isolation chamber. One inmate calls 911 within jail walls causing confusion. Later, officers run to the rescue when a man passes out.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Headbutts and aggression abound during a jail fight. A young man is arrested after stealing $1,500 worth of hats. Officers discover a suicidal inmate who’s no longer taking his medication.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A jail chaplain counsels a sad inmate. An intoxicated woman demands to talk to the Canadian Embassy.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A couple is taken into custody for lewd and indecent exposure. An intoxicated woman believes that she is being treated unfairly, and a man with an existing wrap sheet is busted.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT officers break up an altercation between two inmates. In Portland, OR a belligerent man questions the authorities. In Sarasota, FL a man is busted for DUI. In Las Vegas, NV a woman is taken into custody for battery.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate's flirting calms a jailhouse fight. An inebriated man tries to avoid his eighth DUI by claiming his car was stolen, and a disagreement over Faecbook puts a couple in jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man outfitted in just his underwear is taken into custody. A dad gets busted for DUI while on his way to pick up a pizza for his kids. Officers recover drugs from a suspect’s pocket who is puzzled as to how they got there. A woman learns the hard way “what happens in Vegas stays in Vegas”.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A drug dealer's mean-spirited girlfriend lands herself in isolation. The police deal with an inebriated man accused of throwing rocks, and guards attempt to defuse a situation involving battling cellmates.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Cousins come to jail together but only one leaves. Officers contend the best they can with an unruly inmate. Naked meditation in a parking lot lands a street artist in jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 In the same League
programme.desc: Booze and a cellphone dispute lead one man to the “green suit.” A couple of panhandlers profess their undying love to each other. Alcohol pushes a proud father across the line. A homeless woman gives officers career advice.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A dominatrix is arrested for playing rough. A father is accused of assaulting his daughter's boyfriend, and an inmate's negative attitude leads to trouble.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Tequila is to blame when a man's behavior gets him locked up. A woman tries to sell drugs online. A detainee in holding for a DUI is of the opinion that he’s been jailed for driving too slow.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV an intoxicated man is strapped to a restraining chair. In Portland, OR a seemingly gracious man is arrested for assault. In Spokane, WA a homeless man is brought in for assault. In Salt Lake City, UT a frequent visitor is brought in for threating the security staff at a local bar with a firearm.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers try to deal with a sloppy and combative drunk. A man gets locked up after he blows all his casino winnings, and a woman gets tricked by her bail bondsman.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A hysterical woman is transferred to an isolation cell. A woman shows her undying LA pride to the arresting officers. A young woman is put under observation for threatening harm to herself.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 I'm Not Jane Doe
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a lewd woman is jailed. In Las Vegas, NV a man is placed in the restraining chair after attempting to bite his own fingers off. In Portland, OR a man is brought in for possession. In Sarasota, FL a homeless man is brought in for trespassing and battery.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Deputies corral a suspect into a cell after serious turmoil. A man becomes suicidal after being brought in on burglary charges. Facing the gavel, a prisoner berates a Judge during court proceedings.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After being arrested for domestic violence, a man is placed in restraints. An intoxicated man picks a fight with inmates over their hometown. A woman is arrested for assaulting theater guards.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman lies hobbled in the backseat of a patrol car after kicking the officer in the face. Officers struggle to control an outrageous man. Officers attend to a woman struck by a drunk driver.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers conduct a strip search after an inmate is accused of carrying contraband. A repeat offender dances for deputies and fellow inmates. High on meth, a man acts erratically during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A media circus surrounds OJ Simpson as he is placed in jail for violating his bail agreement. During a body search, a man is tased and pepper-sprayed. A parole violation calls for all hands-on deck.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate claims to be the victim of an internet scam which led to his arrest. Officers take it easy on a rowdy inmate struggling through a spiritual crisis. Years of prison time can’t sway a young gang affiliate from changing his ways. Prisoners cause plumbing problems to send a message. A mother and daughter bond over being locked up together.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 Sunshine on a Cloudy Day
programme.desc: A woman who says she’s called “Sunshine” has less than a sunny disposition. A man ditches a halfway house for jail to get his life in order. A career criminal shows no regret for his “thug life.” Tense moments in Booking as officers and medical staff try to save a young man from a drug overdose.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A trustee finds himself in hot water after officers discover his contraband stash. A disgruntled oil worker doesn’t think the charge fits the crime after stealing two hedge trimmers. Conflicting accounts arise when an officer and a stylish inmate butt heads in booking. A woman learns to put herself first after failed attempts to help her boyfriend’s addiction land her in prison.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Code Blue alarms sound as inmates start fighting inside the men’s jail. An irate man with a huge beard refuses to remove bands inside his facial hair. A man with deep stab wounds stumbles into jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Sarasota, FL an unruly detainee is sent to isolation, twice. In Multnomah county a young man feverishly waits for his release. In Portland, OR a man is jailed for bitting his girlfriend.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Toilet Paper Love Song
programme.desc: A man attempts to eat marijuana in jail. The Special Detention Unit investigates forbidden letters hidden amongst inmates. A bloody, vicious brawl escalates between an imprisoned duo.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A prostitute gets busted on a slow work day. An intoxicated inmate tangles with guards, and an angry woman has cross words for a guard.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After cutting her head, a woman bites and kicks deputies. To investigate potential hidden meanings, a man’s tattoos are examined. A confused man is found with illegal mushrooms at a bus stop.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man admits to urinating in public. A couple spends their date night in jail after being over served, and a DUI suspect passes out during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Three inmates start brawling inside the drunk tank. One man must wear a mask so that officers can avoid his rain of spit. A young woman fails to take jail seriously and behaves provocatively.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Las Vegas Motor Mouth
programme.desc: A belligerent man with a grudge is placed in a restraint chair. An intoxicated woman receives a love note from an inmate on worker status.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A fight involving female detainees breaks out after one woman accuses the other of staring at her. A man is arrested for shattering the hotel glass door as a result of a fight. An old crooner believes that rap stars are going to bail him out of jail. Handcuffs don’t stop a woman from trying to flirt with an officer.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Code Blue alarms sound as inmates start fighting inside the men’s jail. An irate man with a huge beard refuses to remove bands inside his facial hair. A man with deep stab wounds stumbles into jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a man is sent to a holding cell after hurling racial insults. In Reno, NV A man outfitted in just his underwear is taken into custody for battery of a police officer. In Portland, OR an intoxicated eldery man breaks into song during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers outwit a man who refuses to give his name. A repeat DUI offender is jailed yet again. An intoxicated man is taken into custody and once the alcohol wears off he reveals that he’s broken his sobriety.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman booked for domestic violence begins screaming and can’t calm down. Two friends arrested for public intoxication embrace in a tearful reunion. Later, a woman is brought in with a stolen car.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 Old Habits Die Hard
programme.desc: An inmate demands that officers follow her instructions while in jail. A man insists that he has been kidnapped by the police and is being held illegally. An elderly man discovers that domestic violence does not have an age limit. A young woman makes the hard decision to turn herself in to change her life around.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E16 Can't Run from Motorola
programme.desc: A suspect attempts to discard drugs during a foot chase. A man fails to pull over for minor infraction and then bails out his car on foot. A man is arrested after being spotted in a drug transaction.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer is forced to subdue a suspect with his baton. A man asks deputies to give him back his drugs before taking him to jail. A man under the influence causes a disturbance at an apartment complex.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An inebriated man is arrested for peering through the window of a recovery center. After a foot chase, officers bring down a local felon. Police respond to a domestic dispute at a mobile home park.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers rescue a man from a rushing river. A suspect taunts officers during a slow-speed chase. Officers assist a rescue team with extraction from a car. An officer assists in an apartment fire.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Suspects lead Officers on a reckless car chase on residential streets. Police tend to a woman assaulted by her inebriated friend. A DWI suspect is found relieving himself in a public port-a-potty.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E23 Bad Day, Bad Luck
programme.desc: A man is questioned for assaulting a woman on a train. Surveillance captured a man burglarizing a casino. A father kicks his son out of the house after his drinking becomes problematic.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspicious man attempts to flee Police on foot and is later arrested for possession. Officers in New Jersey charge a garage owner with receiving stolen property. Officers arrest a man after witnesses report purse snatching.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Agents of the US Customs and Border Protection pursue a vehicle. Border agents spot two undocumented people while scanning train tracks. Airport Customs detains a man when agents suspect he might be carrying more than luggage.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A deputy pursues a man who fled from a traffic stop. A deputy chases a suspicious man leaving an apartment complex. Two men claim they are trying sell a bike during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E10 Get Off My Roof
programme.desc: The K-9 unit responds when a gunman takes to the rooftops. A drug exchange goes awry when the dealer tries to ditch his stash. A pickup-driving drunk tries to play it off when he smashes his neighbor's parked car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies respond to a fight between a daughter’s boyfriend and her mother. A woman lights candles after an attempted break-in. Police respond when an evicted tenant tries to reenter his old apartment.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers coax a man off a large construction crane. An inebriated man is jailed for domestic abuse. A man is rescued from a flash flood, but his truck isn’t so lucky.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E15 All The World's Our Bedroom
programme.desc: Officers are called to remove a man sleeping in a parking spot at Wal-Mart. A free-spirited couple takes their relationship to their front lawn. A resident brings a knife to a meeting with his building property manager.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E08 You've Gotta Believe Me
programme.desc: A DWI suspect flees from police because he thinks they won’t believe his version of events. A suspect is stopped for jaywalking but when questioned she can’t keep still. A naive man leaves his car unattended for a moment.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: During a routine traffic stop, an Officer recognizes the passengers from a prior drug related arrest. A K-9 unit assists in the pursuit of a grand theft auto suspect who flees on foot. An arrest is made after a couple leaving a known drug house is pulled over and questioned.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man is taken to jail in connection to reports of solicitation. Officers investigate a stolen Escalade. An officer reunites a mother and her 5-year-old son.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A couple gets into a fight with their in-laws when they attempt to take their baby on a 3am drive. Two suspects proclaim their innocence after walking away from a hit and run. A man is attacked by his roommate after he gets ‘too friendly’ with a woman in their home.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond to an armed robbery and carjacking, the suspects are arrested on several charges. A concerned sister reports a fight between her brother and a heavyset burglar. Officers pursue a stolen vehicle and a high speed chase ensues which ends in a wreck.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue a truck after a donut shop robbery. Deputies are dispatched when a wife attacks her husband with an unknown object. Deputies respond to a mother and son knife fight.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E05 Dyed in the Wool
programme.desc: A suspect selling narcotics takes off on foot. A bank robber leaves his wallet in an abandoned money bag. Multiple domestic violence calls end in arrests

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Witnesses of a car burglary assist an officer in locating the suspect. An officer investigates a fight involving a young man and a homeless gentleman. A suspect’s testimony is debunked after an eyewitness confirms that his knife wounds were self-inflicted.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E18 Spiked but Still Moving
programme.desc: A suspect refuses to stop his vehicle even after the officers spike his tires. A dispute over money results in a pregnant woman being attacked. A woman asks for officers to help her rescue cats from a trailer.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer assists with a burglary call at a mall jeweler. An officer responds to a domestic dispute call involving two newlyweds at a Las Vegas motel. An accident occurs during a routine traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers in Las Vegas make an arrest in a grand theft auto call with the help of the K9 unit. An uncooperative driver takes off in the middle of a traffic stop. A woman in Florida is rewarded for her honesty and is let go as her friends are arrested.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect is arrested after officers find a loaded gun during a routine search. Two men are detained after suspected of battery. Officers arrest a man pick-pocketing during Mardi Gras.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An arrest is made in a buy-bust sting operation. An elderly man is questioned after reportedly kicking a juvenile in the face. A man is shot in the head by his roommate.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E02 Who Let the Dogs Out
programme.desc: Officers deploy a police K-9 when a burglary suspect takes refuge in a lemon tree. A suspect on the run seeks shelter in a stranger’s house. A biker with a suspended license just doesn’t know how to listen.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A patrolman plays linebacker when a fleeing thief runs right into him. Armed-robbery victims give a colorful play-by-play on surveillance footage of the crime. Officers have to get tearful children back to their estranged mother.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A stolen vehicle pursuit ends in a take down and recovery of additional evidence. A store employee flags down an officer who steps in to make a theft related arrest. An officer is accompanied by several units in pursuit of a stolen vehicle.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond to an assault call which escalates to car chase and the eventual arrest of two suspects. Officers spot a known drug dealer who uses a troubling method to conceal his narcotics. An officer curbs a heckler outside a popular bar.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man throws out his narcotics during a foot-chase with police. A woman is arrested for possession of drug paraphernalia. Officers call for back-up after a woman is held at knife-point.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E15 Abandonment of a Trailer
programme.desc: A dangerous high speed motorcycle chase ends in a wreck and a subsequent arrest. A Florida woman is pulled over in a routine traffic stop and is rewarded for her cooperation. A sheriff creates harmony between a quarreling couple at a mobile park.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E01 Ignorance is an Excuse
programme.desc: Two men engage in a fist fight on the street over an alleged robbery. A couple claims that they didn’t know the car they are driving is stolen. Occupants of a vehicle claim that all of the contraband found in their car is medical equipment.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies respond to a call of a man shooting a gun in his front yard. Officers are called to a domestic dispute over a wrinkly infant’s shirt. Four armed and suspicious men are spotted by deputies.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers are called to a burglary at a warehouse housing expensive items. Police are called to the scene of a threatening man with a knife. Officers thwart an attempted suicide during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect goes out to get his haircut and winds up in jail. Officers try to piece together a puzzling street fight between a boxer and his confused friend. Cops give a suspect every chance to admit to his obvious crime.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E16 We Run the Show
programme.desc: A stealthy robbery suspect leads officers on a chase through backyards. After dropping a bag of meth, a man swears he’s only seen the drug on TV. A doped-up domestic violence suspect tries to claim self-defense.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A high speed chase comes to a halt in a residential area and the driver is taken in for sobriety testing. A suspicious vehicle takes off as an officer approaches and a high speed chase ensues. An officer pulls over a vehicle belonging to a battery suspect who attempts to eat evidence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer arrests a driver who attempts to swallow drugs stashed in his mouth. An officer arrests a repeated drug offender in an area notorious for drug trafficking. An officer pulls over an unlicensed woman driver who is arrested for providing falsified identification.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E28 Tell it to My Wife
programme.desc: A man’s wife can’t help him stay out of jail no matter how much he calls for her. One thief tries to give back his stolen loot. When approached by officers, a woman goes from passed out to out of control.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E24 I’m With You Guys
programme.desc: A man involved in a drug deal claims he works for the task force. An irate woman slams the front door when Officers arrive. Police pull over two young suspects in an area known for drug activity.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers are called to a restaurant after the owner is held at gunpoint. Police respond to a woman being sexually harassed in a park. A drunk man tells police he is going to buy a lighthouse.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A white-knuckled police chase ends in a dramatic escape and an unsettling officer injury. A woman spots an intoxicated prowler in a tree. Officers bring in the K-9 unit to sniff out a suspicious van.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A woman claims a man abused her then put a curse on her. Police arrest a man for having illegal drugs on him. An elderly woman locks herself in the restroom at a bank.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An ex-felon threatens to kill his spouse after she announces she want to divorce him. A driver is stopped with suspicious plants in her car. A woman crashes her friends truck into a pedestrian and a tree.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer poses as a prostitute in an attempt to attract “johns”. A suspect flees on foot through the woods following an assault. An officer investigates a local bar known for illegal activity.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies assist border patrol in pursuit of a vehicle that has blown checkpoint and its tires. A drunk woman is pulled over not knowing she is missing a tire.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A speedy suspect makes officers chase him through a creek. A teenage Good Samaritan gets in the middle of a bizarre domestic dispute. After a woman destroys her home, she begs police to arrest her.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A fleeing vehicle goes for a spin when officers execute a perfect PIT maneuver. Cops try to flush out a suspect who barricades himself inside a donut shop. Officers hit the meth mother lode when they stop a truck in a downpour.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue two suspects who were believed to have been involved in a robbery. Police attend to a man who has injected a concerning amount of methamphetamine. Officers break up a fight in progress involving two men outside a convenience store.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man stages a sit-in in his car in an attempt to stop it from being towed. A homeowner denies that he’s selling drugs despite the large amount of evidence found in his home. A safe full of evidence is found during a traffic stop.

programme.desc: Deputies assist border patrol in pursuit of a vehicle that has blown checkpoint and its tires. A drunk woman is pulled over not knowing she is missing a tire.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E26 Eye in the Sky
programme.desc: A jaywalker darts on a mad dash through the weeds. Things go badly for a suspect on a stolen motorcycle when choppers help officers track him down. A domestic dispute leads cops to a slew of unexpected crimes.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E07 No Money, More Problems
programme.desc: A woman hides in her apartment after she skips out on paying her cab fare. A knife fight results in multiple calls to the police for help. A French tourist get a bus ride from Hell in Florida.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An uncooperative suspect obeys instructions from his more levelheaded relative. A dead ringer for “The Rock” uncovers some crack rock. Officers try to get the truth out of two known drug users.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A car pursuit turned foot chase ends with the suspect jumping head first into a creek-bed. Officers catch up to a man trying to flee the scene after assaulting his wife. Officers stop a suspicious vehicle driving with no headlights.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Unhappy about getting stopped for drinking while biking, a man takes off on foot. A woman in her PJs doesn’t know how she wound up in a stolen vehicle. Officers discover a couple smoking Meth in front of a young child.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond to a call reporting an officer-involved fight. A brazen driver careens into a ditch after failing to yield. A berserk woman is pulled over for her erratic driving.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E12 Blood and Scars, Bro!
programme.desc: A suspect races through the neighborhood after his scooter can’t outrun police. Cops discover a drugged, incoherent wild man lying in the bushes. Officers try to make peace between neighbors with pit bull problems.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A dangerous pursuit between Officers and a known meth dealer ends in an arrest. A suspect with several felony warrants is apprehended without incident. A pursuit involving a stolen motorcycle exceeds speed of 100mph.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E01 She Came Onto Me
programme.desc: An undercover police officer sets up a sting to buy drugs. Officers find a surprise in a suspect’s trunk. A man claims that a prostitute has kidnapped him.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers stop a man riding a bicycle in the middle of the street with no backlight. Suspects have a fun night out in a neighborhood known for drugs. Officers are dispatched to help a woman when her boyfriend threatens her with a brick.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A jaywalker with no ID bolts away from an officer. A man mixes illicit items with his pizza. A woman involved in a domestic violence call blames her monthly issues.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E28 Tell it to My Wife
programme.desc: A man’s wife can’t help him stay out of jail no matter how much he calls for her. One thief tries to give back his stolen loot. When approached by officers, a woman goes from passed out to out of control.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man runs from Police over a parole violation. Officers respond when a trouble maker is expelled from a bar for bad behavior. Police pursue a man after he bails from his car during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E15 Abandonment of a Trailer
programme.desc: A dangerous high speed motorcycle chase ends in a wreck and a subsequent arrest. A Florida woman is pulled over in a routine traffic stop and is rewarded for her cooperation. A sheriff creates harmony between a quarreling couple at a mobile park.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue an SUV on the freeway. Deputies are called after an agitated man arms himself with scissors. A driver tells officers the illegal items found in his car was left by a friend.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer coordinates a reverse prostitution sting to capture suspects who solicit prostitutes. An inebriated man is detained until he sobers up. Officers stop a stolen vehicle.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond to an assault call which escalates to car chase and the eventual arrest of two suspects. Officers spot a known drug dealer who uses a troubling method to conceal his narcotics. An officer curbs a heckler outside a popular bar.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E05 Tuck and Roll, Hold On!
programme.desc: A stolen vehicle investigation results in a brief foot chase and subsequent arrest. A driver is pulled over and is arrested for the possession of a controlled substance. While on patrol an officer spots an distressed man inside a vehicle with busted windows.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A fleeing suspect takes officers on a wild chase through oncoming traffic. Surveillance footage of a stabbing helps police find the vicious attacker. Cops track a subject into an uncooperative stranger’s apartment.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue a truck driving backwards on a freeway. A suspect jumps a train to evade police. A woman claims to be disabled when a pill falls from her pocket.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man is taken to jail in connection to reports of solicitation. Officers investigate a stolen Escalade. An officer reunites a mother and her 5-year-old son.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers coordinate a prostitution sting in a neighborhood. Officers pull over a vehicle with a missing license plate. Officers stop a woman driving a stolen vehicle.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police respond to an emergency call and find a man in dire trouble. Deputies respond to an abusive husband at a local eatery. Two women try to buy narcotics from an undercover deputy during a sting.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: The Organized Crime Unit places officers undercover as drug dealers on a street corner for a drug-reversal sting operation. An Officer responds to a domestic dispute call after a man's property is destroyed by his girlfriend's ill-tempered father. During a routine patrol, an Officer spots an intoxicated man assaulting a woman.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect fights back with his teeth during an arrest. A man tries to get revenge for his lost cell phone. A woman claims her neighbor slashed her tires for no reason.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies detain a man when a gun falls from his pantleg. Deputies are called when a father spits on his son’s girlfriend. Officers respond when a child is bitten by two large dogs.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E21 Hands Off The Junk
programme.desc: A passenger bails from a fleeing stolen vehicle then claims that he was only getting a ride. An undercover officer pulls a sting on a handsy prostitute. An anxious lady gets nabbed for weed after calling the police on her quarrelsome husband.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect flees as officers respond to a fight call. A belligerent meth user refuses to cooperate after being pulled over. A cranky husband gets busted for pot after his wife kicks over his Harley.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies search for a man who ran from a traffic stop. A man being pursued tells officers he was going to his mother’s house. A drunk driver won’t admit to hitting a car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers are called when two intoxicated suspects decide to have some fun and vandalize a fence. Undercover officers set up a narcotics sting at a hotel. A man is found lying naked in a parking lot.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man assaults another man for groping his girlfriend. Police make several drug-related arrests while patrolling New Orleans. An adventurous suspect is arrested while scaling down a drainpipe.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E36 Don't Keep on Truckin
programme.desc: The occupants of a car with out-of-state plates try to conceal their identities. Officers investigate a vehicle lingering near a park known. An officer investigates a robbery at a truck stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man claims to be protecting the car he breaks into. Officers respond when a couple gets too friendly while out in public. Police are dispatched when a drunk woman pounds on her neighbor’s door.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E25 Hide and Go Porch
programme.desc: Officers engage in a car chase when they spot a possible robbery suspect. A man nicknamed “Danger” is tasered after assaulting several girls. Suspects bail from a vehicle and hide under a porch.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E13 I Take This Criminal
programme.desc: During an arrest, a suspect decides to pop the question to his girlfriend. An abandoned house becomes the target of burglary. Two brothers’ dispute over a business matter leads to violence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An arrest is made in a buy-bust sting operation. An elderly man is questioned after reportedly kicking a juvenile in the face. A man is shot in the head by his roommate.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An arrest is made in a notorious New Jersey drug hotbed. Officers find a suspect hidden under a mattress. A bicycle thief is caught red handed.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: When officers approach, a suspect flees into a fast food restaurant. A driver takes his granny's wheels for a dangerous spin with cops in pursuit. Sheriffs catch up to a man who fled the scene of a possible domestic battery.

programme.title: Tom the Tow Truck
programme.desc: Poznaj Toma, wynalazcę z Samochodzikowa! W swoim nowoczesnym laboratorium tworzy wynalazki, aby rozwiązać problemy przyjaciół.

programme.title: Tom's Garage
programme.desc: Tom the Tow Truck pomaga swoim przyjaciołom z Car City, gdy ci potrzebują naprawy. Zawsze daje im coś specjalnego po każdej pracy.

programme.title: AnimaCars Discovery
programme.desc: Poznaj Jonny'ego Toolboxa i AnimaCars i dołącz do ich licznych misji ratunkowych, aby przywrócić spokój w Animatown!

programme.title: Car Patrol
programme.desc: Wszyscy w Samochodzikowie troszczą się o siebie nawzajem. Patrol to specjalny zespół, który dba o bezpieczeństwo mieszkańców.

programme.title: Carl the Super Truck
programme.desc: Carl Super Truck i jego transformacje na ratunek! Gdy Samochodzikowo potrzebuje pomocy, ten superbohater wkracza do akcji.

programme.title: Construction Squad
programme.desc: Zespół budowlany buduje Samochodzikowo cegła po cegle! Pokazują, że wszystko jest możliwe z pomocą naszych przyjaciół.

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Odkryjmy liczby, litery, kolory i kształty poprzez zabawne i ekscytujące zadania na świeżym powietrzu z załogą AnimaCars!

programme.title: RoboFuse
programme.desc: Robo wraz ze swoimi lojalnymi przyjaciółmi chroni Samochodzikowo przed planami Zitrona, chcącego ukraść źródło energii miasta.

programme.title: Super Truck
programme.desc: Carl Super Truck i jego gadżety na ratunek! Gdy mieszkańcy Car City potrzebują pomocy, ten superbohater wkracza do akcji.

programme.desc: 20 (mostly) great songs that all hit the top 3 in 1980, but didn't quite reach the summit. Including Godley & Creme, Phil Collins, Laurie Anderson, Kim Wilde & Abba.

programme.title: Get Fresh At The Weekend!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Get Fresh At The Weekend!
programme.desc: It's the weekend, and we're showing out! Classic pop that has stood the test of time.

programme.title: Sinitta's Everyone I Fancied!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Sinitta's Everyone I Fancied!
programme.desc: 100 minutes of everyone Sinitta fancied being, or just plain adored in the 80s. Her favourite boys & gorgeous girls in their fiercest videos - you'll fancy them a little bit too!

programme.title: Every Song From NOW 7 - 1986
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Every Song From NOW 7 - 1986
programme.desc: NOW 7 was released in 1986 and featured all the tracks of the moment. A double vinyl or double tape, the choice was yours - but the double CD had to wait until NOW 10!

programme.title: All Day - It's 1986!
programme.desc: Dramatic storylines, big dance routines, neon lights & iconic fashions - these are the classic music videos that made 1986!

programme.title: The 1986 POWER Hour!
programme.desc: 60 minutes of power pop & rock! Earplugs at the ready as we rewind to 1986 with Robert Palmer, Iggy Pop, The Smiths, Mr Mister & Peter Gabriel.

programme.title: Mark Goodier's No.2s of 1986
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Mark Goodier's No.2s of 1986
programme.desc: 60 minutes of back to back UK chart runners-up from 1986 - including hit ladies Madonna, Sinitta, Kim Wilde & Su Pollard! With Mr Charts himself - Mark Goodier.

programme.title: Timewarp TV! 1988
programme.desc: 1988 was a top year for pop - and here's the proof!

programme.title: WOW! What A Party!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 WOW! What A Party!
programme.desc: A non-stop ticket to the ultimate retro rave! We crank up the neon and hit the dancefloor with the most electrifying feelgood music videos the 80s had to offer.

programme.title: Pat Sharp's 80s Wicked Weekender!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Pat Sharp's 80s Wicked Weekender!
programme.desc: An exceptional Sharp selection - 4 hours of fantastic feelgood to help your weekend go off the deep-end!

programme.title: Denise's 5*Star Families - Top 30!
programme.desc: Brothers, Sisters, Husbands, Wives - they made it a family business back in the 80s! And Denise Pearson was one of them with her siblings - in pop supergroup Five Star!

programme.title: Erasure: 1986-1994
programme.desc: From their debut hit Sometimes in 1986 - here's an hour of Erasure in their late 80s & early 90s pomp - every song made the UK top 10!

programme.title: It's Better With Two! 80s Duos
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 It's Better With Two! 80s Duos
programme.desc: Two is better than one - well usually. These are our top 30 duos of the 80s - most of them great, but some a little suspect. We'll let you decide which is which!

programme.desc: A cavalcade of clothing calamities & 'interesting choices' from superstars including Bowie, Madonna, Adam Ant, Bananarama, Queen, Wham, Five Star & maybe even Limahl himself!

programme.title: 30 Movie Monsters with Pat Sharp
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 30 Movie Monsters with Pat Sharp
programme.desc: A classic decade of movie hits presented by Pat Sharp - and these are 30 of the best. Including Electric Dreams, Rocky, St Elmo's Fire and a bit of Dirty Dancing!

programme.title: First Blast of Summer!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 First Blast of Summer!
programme.desc: The Heat Is On with the hottest tunes of the 80s! We crank up the neon and hit the dancefloor with the most electrifying feelgood music videos the decade had to offer.

programme.title: 1980s Glastonbury Headliners!
programme.desc: Back when the festival was much younger & much smaller, you might be surprised at some of the headliners! This is Glastonbury 1980s style - in order!

programme.title: 60 Summer Sizzlers! 1980-1989
programme.desc: 60 of the best feel-good summer hits! Each was a Top 10 smash across June, July & August in the '80s - on the beach, on your walkman, and at the Radio 1 Roadshow!

programme.title: First Blast of Summer!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 First Blast of Summer!
programme.desc: The Heat Is On with the hottest tunes of the 80s! We crank up the neon and hit the dancefloor with the most electrifying feelgood music videos the decade had to offer.

programme.title: On The Beach!
programme.desc: A whole hour of videos filmed on a beach, by the coast or at the seaside! Can you spot all the locations? There's Sydney, Ibiza and Malibu to find.

programme.title: The NOW Yearbook 1982
programme.desc: Bruno Brookes with the year of the Kids from Fame and Eurovision's Bucks Fizz & Bardo! And we also first encountered future global superstars George Michael & Boy George.

programme.title: It's Better With Two! 80s Duos
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 It's Better With Two! 80s Duos
programme.desc: Two is better than one - well usually. These are our top 30 duos of the 80s - most of them great, but some a little suspect. We'll let you decide which is which!

programme.title: The NOW Yearbook 1982
programme.desc: Bruno Brookes with the year of the Kids from Fame and Eurovision's Bucks Fizz & Bardo! And we also first encountered future global superstars George Michael & Boy George.

programme.title: The 1982 Video Hall of Fame
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The 1982 Video Hall of Fame
programme.desc: Radio 1 & Top of the Pops legend Gary Davies with the iconic images & award winning clips that set the style of 1982. Including Blancmange, Billy Idol, Soft Cell & The Stranglers.

programme.title: Way Back When! 1982
programme.desc: 60 minutes of lesser heard hits from 1982. Including Fleetwood Mac, Simple Minds, Bardo, The Go-Gos & Donna Summer.

programme.title: 1982 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Dramatic storylines, big dance routines, neon lights & iconic fashions - these are the classic music videos that made 1982!

programme.title: 1982's One-Hit-Wonders! Top 10
programme.desc: 10 artists that had a single big song in 1982 - then never darkened the UK Top 20 ever again! Remember Trio, Bardo, J Geils Band or Toto Coelo?

programme.title: 80s Rock Anthems!
programme.desc: Non-stop 80s rock & power ballads! From Queen, Bon Jovi & Whitesnake to Meat Loaf, Bonnie Tyler & Tina Turner.

programme.title: Top of the 70s Charts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Top of the 70s Charts
programme.desc: 3 hours of bona fide classics from the best decade of music - every one of them made UK number 1. With rock, disco, soul, pop & more!

programme.title: Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1972
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1972
programme.desc: 45 minutes of back to back number 1s from 1972 - from The New Seekers to Little Jimmy Osmond via My Ding-a-Ling! With Mr Charts himself - Mark Goodier.

programme.title: Who Won Wot? 1970-1979
programme.desc: From The NME to The Grammys to the coveted 'Rear of the Year' - Mark Goodier's 10 hour marathon of 70s award winners lasts nearly as long as the Oscars!

programme.title: 1979 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1979!

programme.title: What? They Only Peaked at 11?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 What? They Only Peaked at 11?
programme.desc: That's right - every one of these (mostly) classic tunes JUST missed the UK top 10. All of them got to number 11 and then - no higher! Including a brace each from Elton & Queen.

programme.title: Retro Rewind! 70s Edition
programme.desc: From hippies to punk rockers, via folk, funk, soul & disco - these are the classic songs that made the 70s!

programme.title: One Hit Wonders! 1970-1979
programme.desc: They all had 1 massive song, then never skirted the UK Top 20 singles chart again! Here are 70 acts from every year of the 70s, in order, who all achieved their 15 minutes of fame.

programme.title: Mike Read's Pop Quiz: 1979
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Mike Read's Pop Quiz: 1979
programme.desc: Time to show off your nerdy knowledge as Mike Read quizzes you on the stars and songs of 1979!

programme.title: One Hit Wonders! 1970-1979
programme.desc: They all had 1 massive song, then never skirted the UK Top 20 singles chart again! Here are 70 acts from every year of the 70s, in order, who all achieved their 15 minutes of fame.

programme.title: Bruno's Can You Believe It?!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bruno's Can You Believe It?!
programme.desc: Incredible facts & amazing trivia about some of the decade's most famous songs & videos! This is 2 hours of Radio 1 legend Bruno Brookes asking 'Can You Believe It?!'

programme.desc: Incredible facts & amazing trivia about some of the decade's most famous songs & videos! This is 2 hours of Radio 1 legend Bruno Brookes asking 'Can You Believe It?!'

programme.title: Silly Songs of the 70s!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Silly Songs of the 70s!
programme.desc: 2 hours of funny videos, silly songs & novelty hits - all of them amazing and all in the best possible taste! But watch out for those Smurfs...

programme.title: 50 Summer Sizzlers! 1970-1979
programme.desc: 50 of the very best feel-good summer hits. Each was a Top 10 smash across June, July & August in the '70s - on the beach, on your transistor radio, and at the big Radio 1 Roadshow!

programme.title: 70s School Disco!
programme.desc: From the era of Glam Rock, New Wave & Disco - it's all the party hits from just 1 decade - the 1970s! Platform boots & flares at the ready?

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 70s Stars - But Who Is The Oldest?
programme.desc: It's music's very own over-70s club, packed with superstars including Barry Gibb, Debbie Harry, and Bryan Ferry. Buy they're all youngsters next to the select bunch aged 80-plus!

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Party Hits '76! with Dave Bartram

programme.title: David Bowie in the 70s & 80s

programme.desc: 2 hours of his classic videos - from Space Oddity to Absolute Beginners.

programme.title: Clare Grogan's Teenage Kicks!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Clare Grogan's Teenage Kicks!
programme.desc: The 5 years from '77 to '81 was possibly the most exciting & vibrant time to be a teenager & Clare Grogan was there - buying the records, seeing the bands & wearing the t-shirts!

programme.title: Traveling for Your Tastebuds
programme.desc: You don't have to travel - Italian and Filipino foods are accessible right here, right now.

programme.title: Street Food Faves at Home
programme.desc: Frankie makes street food at home. Get ready! - because you've never seen rice like this before.

programme.title: Chef Saransh Goila: Kuliya ki chaat
programme.desc: Chef Saransh Goila and our host, Sonal Ved, make kuliya ki chaat, the iconic chaat from North India.

programme.title: Chef Irfan Pabaney: Cheesy Paneer Cone Chaat
programme.desc: Our CCO (chief chaat officer), Sonal Ved, whips up cone chaat with chef Irfan Pabaney and teaches him Hindi.

programme.title: Chef Hussain Shahzad: Crispy Lamb Bhel
programme.desc: Sonal Ved and chef Hussain Shahzad teach you a classic with a twist as they make a crispy lamb bhel.

programme.title: Chef Amninder Sandhu: Dhakai Chaat
programme.desc: Watch chef Amninder Sandhu and our host Sonal Ved partner to create the rarity that is dhakai chaat.

programme.title: Chef Manish Mehrotra: Burrata Papdi Chaat
programme.desc: Chef Manish Mehrotra and Sonal Ved create a dish that you wouldn't imagine—a burrata papdi chaat.

programme.title: Chef Pooja Dhingra: 11 layer dahi chaat
programme.desc: Chef Pooja Dhingra creates an 11 layer dahi chaat inspired by the English trifle with Sonal Ved.

programme.title: Chef Prateek Sadhu: Lakhanpur De Bhalle
programme.desc: Chef Prateek Sadhu and Sonal Ved make Lakhanpur Ke Bhalle - a chaat that is close to Sadhu's heart.

programme.title: Chef Ranveer Brar: Paani Puri
programme.desc: For the finale of Chaats Of India, chef Ranveer Brar and Sonal Ved make the ultimate chaat: Paani puri.

programme.title: Dumplings, Steam Buns, and Dim Sum, Oh My!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In Hong Kong, one brother will live like a king, while the other will check out the city’s street food scene.

programme.title: Simplicity vs. Splendor on the Seaside
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Soaking in the beauty and elegance of the French Riviera, Marko and Alex are in Nice to enjoy the simplicity and splendor of this seaside city.

programme.title: Keep Austin Weird
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In the state capital of Texas, Marko and Alex see what Austin has to offer. An eclectic city known for its music and cuisine, the guys brave the Texas heat and check out what keeps Austin weird.

programme.title: Levels of Luxury in Laos
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Sandwiched between Thailand, Vietnam, and Cambodia, Laos is a destination often overlooked by tourists. Marko and Alex are uncovering the hidden gem of Vientiane, the capital city, to see what goes on in this sleepy town beside the Mekong River.

programme.title: The Gainful Grace of Geneva
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Marko and Alex find themselves in the prosperous and pristine city of Geneva, Switzerland. A city nestled alongside a beautiful glacier-fed lake, the guys will explore the riches Geneva has to offer.

programme.title: The Thriving Traditions of Taipei
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Welcome to the buzzing capital of Taiwan. A rich blend of cultures, old meets new in this thriving metropolis of Taipei. Marko and Alex eat their way through the city, experiencing some unique traditions along the way.

programme.title: The Lion's Share of Lyon
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Marko and Alex head to Lyon, France, a city known for its gastronomy and endless history.

programme.title: Oceanside in Okinawa
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Ocean breeze, turquoise waters and a whole lot of amazing cuisine. Marko and Alex are soaking up that island life in Okinawa, Japan and learning what makes it so unique.

programme.title: Genoa From Above and Below
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In Genoa, the brothers cruise the streets, while one of them gets a taste for the lavish lifestyle of Italy's Northwestern port. They take in all the views: heads in the clouds on a high-flying funicular, and just above water at the local aquarium.

programme.title: The L.A. Lifestyle
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Green juice, avocado toast, and surfers galore. Marko and Alex are back home in Los Angeles to explore their town, staycation style. From downtown to the beach, the guys do everything fun under the sun in the city of angels.

programme.title: Dumplings, Steam Buns, and Dim Sum, Oh My!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In Hong Kong, one brother will live like a king, while the other will check out the city’s street food scene.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Marco and Erica get to know about the dark history of Estonia while exploring the remains of Narva, the country’s third largest city at its easternmost limit. From the fortress of Narva and the bastions of Narva to an abandoned textile mill, everything tells them about the intriguing story of the town. They also learn about the Russian and ‘alien’ people living here.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: For the ever-dwindling Parsi community of western India, food is both pleasure and heritage — and a secret language in danger of dying out. Eisha meets the renowned food blogger and caterer, Mehnaz Mansud, who introduces her to some of the forgotten recipes of Parsi cuisine such as Dodima Gosht, the unusual and yet sublime fusion of mutton and bottle gourd.

programme.title: Xplore Israel
programme.desc: Nestled in the Judean Hills, Jerusalem has been the most revered, fought over, and loved city in the world for centuries.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Unwind Jumerriah Al-Qasr, Dubai
programme.desc: From the fragrances at the Perfume Souk to a hot air balloon ride in the desert, Sabrina gets a taste of heritage and luxury at Madinat Jumeirah.

programme.title: Kissed By The Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Kissed By The Sea Mauritius 1
programme.desc: Blessed with coral reefs, sapphire waters and powder-white beaches, Mauritius is the kind of place that rewards even the smallest attempts at exploration. Renowned adventurer, Sakshi Pradhan finds herself in an old lighthouse on Fouquet Island and then stumbles upon the Junk Café. From snorkeling in sapphire waters to taking a walk with lions in Casela National Park, she comes across various adventures in Mauritius, which make her feel alive.

programme.title: Xplore Israel
programme.desc: Nestled in the Judean Hills, Jerusalem has been the most revered, fought over, and loved city in the world for centuries.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Marco and Erica soak in the vitality of the student town, Tartu, and experience its eccentricities at the Leaning House and the AHHAA Science Centre. Following this, they visit Obinista, the cultural centre of Setomaa, where the Seto community introduces them to the traditional ways of dressing, singing and dancing. They also indulge in a traditional smoke sauna at nearby Võromaa.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Great World Hotels Desroches 1, Seychelles
programme.desc: Looking for fun and relaxation, Freishia visits Seychelles, where she ends up having the beach holiday of a lifetime.

programme.title: Xplore Israel
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Israel Jerusalem & Tel Aviv
programme.desc: While visiting Jerusalem, Aradhana walks the Via Dolorosa, the path that covers Christ's journey from condemnation to crucifixion.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Xp Guide Colombo, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: A place where sounds of the calming shores collides endlessly with that of an urbane environment and lives shuttle between the beaches.

programme.title: Kissed By The Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Kissed By The Sea Mauritius 2
programme.desc: While exploring island life in Mauritius, Sakshi Pradhan tries out the third longest zipline in the world and sees the unique phenomenon of the 23 coloured Earth at Vallée des Couleurs. Following this, she takes a submarine ride and explores the passion of the locals for horse races. She also encounters tortoises and crocodiles at the Vanilla Crocodile Park.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 World Heritage Pattadakal, India
programme.desc: Listen to the tales of Pattadakal temples, built by Kings, claiming their legitimacy from Gods and hear the echoes of the legacy of sun-worshippers.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 10 Days Estonia Sooma National Park
programme.desc: Embracing Estonia’s largest area of swamps, meadows and waterside forests, Soomaa National Park is the second largest national park in the country. While trying out bog walking and camping over here, Marco and Erica experience what is known as the “fifth season” in Estonia, the season of floods. They also explore Tallinn’s history with espionage, and go on to soak in the romance at its Christmas Market.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Great World Hotels Desroches 2, Seychelles
programme.desc: From visiting a tortoise feeding pen to taking a cycle tour around Desroche island, Freishia gets to reconnect with nature in Seychelles.

programme.title: Xplore Israel
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Israel Tel Aviv
programme.desc: Aradhana discovers Tel Aviv's historical treasures in Neve Tzedek, the first Jewish quarter outside the old port city of Jaffa.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Xp Guide Hong Kong
programme.desc: Hong Kong the estuary where the east meets the west. The city is facinating in every facet of culture, be it cuisine, music,dance or simply lifestyle.

programme.title: Best From The Rest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Best From The Rest Oman Must Sees
programme.desc: Here is a list of Oman’s must-see attractions, each of which unveils a unique facet of this Middle Eastern gem.

programme.title: Landmarks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 Landmarks Killing Fields Cambodia
programme.desc: Amidst the idyllic landscapes of Cambodia is a landscape stained with unspeakable horrors that reveals the darkest chapter of the nation's history. This bone-chilling relic of its tragic past exposes the true scale of the Khmer Rouge's systematic campaign of mass killings. Uncover the factors that led to the rise of Pol Pot's regime and the devastating consequences that reverberated across the nation.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 World Spas Sarovar Premier, India
programme.desc: Ayurveda, a unique, indispensable branch of medicine is based on the principles of keeping the one’s mind, body and spirit in equilibrium. In Kerala, it isn’t just a health care system, but a way of life and that’s what brings us to Sarovar Premier Spa Retreat.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 City Breaks Madrid, Spain
programme.desc: There is no better place to feel ‘duende’, the spirit and passion of Spain than its lively capital, Madrid. Alex catches some of the city’s infectious liveliness at its bustling squares such as Puerto del Sol and Plaza Mayor. She experiences the Spaniards’ love for food as she tucks into authentic Spanish churros. She also finds out about the city’s rich and complex history at places such as Cathedral de la Almudena and Madrid’s Royal Palace.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Quest Fort Begu 2, India
programme.desc: While the vast majority of Rajasthan’s inhabitants have always been staunch vegetarians, there has been tremendous popularity of the meat dishes in the state’s culinary culture. This came mainly from the Rajput rulers, which is why Alex meets Ajayraj Singh who comes from a royal lineage. He introduces her to the history of the valiant rulers of Mewar and some of the secret meat preparations of the kingdom

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: Which is the UNESCO City of Literature? Here's a clue - it's also the treasure trove of Guinness! Taste the merriment in Dublin.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Backpack Jakarta and Jog Jakarta, Indonesia
programme.desc: Hannah Jackson visits the Borobudur temple and explores the local art and nightlife scenes in Jogjakarta.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Rohan and Healer
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Travel Diaries of Healer and Rohan Almora, India
programme.desc: Rohan discovers interesting stories about Almora through its sights such as Kasar Devi and art forms such as Aipan paintings.

programme.title: The Gypsies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 The Gypsies Jabalpur, India
programme.desc: After more than a fortnight of travel, Benafsha and Krisann stop at Bhedaghat for some exciting adventures amid its stunning marble cliffs.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 City Breaks Bundi, India
programme.desc: From stunning palaces to ornate stepwells, Asmita finds herself soaking in the romance of Bundi, a charming 14th century town in Rajasthan.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Quest Heritage Haveli, India
programme.desc: Where many ancient Indian civilizations flourished in the most resource-filled areas, the people of Rajasthan created a powerful, complex, layered and regal culture and cuisine in the largely arid land that they called home. Alex discovers this when she meets Anjali Singh, a member of the royal family of Jaipur, who shows her how to make two prized recipes from her family’s legacy - Papad Ki Chutney and Safed Murg.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: Driving along the world's longest defined coastal route has a lot of surprises in store. Right from the arty Galway city to the wilderness in Burren.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Backpack Mt. Bromo and Komodo National Park, Indonesia
programme.desc: Hannah Jackson visits the youngest volcano on the ancient Tengger caldera, Mount Bromo. She also goes to see the Komodo dragons.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Rohan and Healer
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Travel Diaries of Healer and Rohan Landour, India
programme.desc: Rohan and his furry friend, Healer, lose themselves in the English charm of the misty hamlet of Landour.

programme.title: The Gypsies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 The Gypsies Bandhavgarh, India
programme.desc: Will Krisann and Benafsha’s safari in Bandhavgarh National Park offer them a chance to see the big striped cat in all its glory?

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Bihar’s rural heartland has a lot to offer the intrepid traveller. Alex meets Rajesh Ramjan, a politician, a cultural conservationist and a foodie, who shows her the beauty of Bihar’s countryside and introduces her to some traditional Bihari dishes. From dahi-chura, the Bihari breakfast of champions to flavourful preparations of fresh local vegetables simmering on a traditional stove, Alex gets an understanding of the nourishing cuisine that fuels farmers to toil in the fields all day.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 Backpack Labuan Bajo and Bali, Indonesia
programme.desc: Hannah Jackson explores the scenery, culture and flavours on the islands of Komodo National Park. She also visits the Taman Ayun temple in Bali.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Rohan and Healer
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Travel Diaries of Healer and Healer and Rohan Auli, India
programme.desc: Rohan introduces his spirited canine companion, Healer, to snow for the very first time at Auli, a popular hill station in Uttarakhand.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Despite the boom of the 21st century development, Tallinn, the 1000-year-old capital of Estonia, safeguards its UNESCO-listed medieval Old Town, one of Europe’s most complete walled cities. Marco Biagioli and Erica Melargo, a famous Italian nomad couple, lose themselves in its fairy-tale charms, and find out its legends. They also visit iconic attractions such as Alexander Nevsky Cathedral and Raeapteek, the oldest pharmacy in Europe that has continuously been in business in the same building.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Ireland Wild Atlantic Way
programme.desc: Relive the glories of Irish aristocracy as if no time has gone by, in the castles of Ireland. Relish the quaintness of laidback Irish towns.

programme.title: The Gypsies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 The Gypsies Orchha, India
programme.desc: Benafsha and Krisann’s journey takes them back in time in the medieval town of Orchha, the erstwhile capital of the Bundelkhand empire.
